nodes.text: Takor the Terrible was a male Gamorrean warlord living on Tatooine during the Cold War. Infamous for taking prisoners, only to throw them into the maw of the Sarlacc to torture them, he was killed by a Galactic Republic individual in 3643 BBY.
Takor the Terrible appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a bonus boss for the heroic quest "The Long Goodbye".
